channel.title: Comments on: NewBay Launches World’s First Aggregated Mobile Social Networking Solution

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description: Thanks for the link. I am impressed a telco would go for an aggregated system rather than trying to reinvent a social network. Nice work Newbay.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the link. I am impressed a telco would go for an aggregated system rather than trying to reinvent a social network. Nice work Newbay.
